content.raw:
nit It was really confusing to figure out why `myprefix` and `<></>` were for. Can there be a comment that explains that they’re complete nonsense values, only for simple testing?

\(Or even better, replace `myprefix` with something readable, like `--` or `[indent] `, and name the parent element so that the tags aren’t empyt?\)
content.html:
nit It was really confusing to figure out why myprefix and <></> were for. Can there be a comment that explains that they’re complete nonsense values, only for simple testing?

(Or even better, replace myprefix with something readable, like -- or [indent], and name the parent element so that the tags aren’t empyt?)
